braincomputer.db package¶

Submodules¶

braincomputer.db.db module¶

class braincomputer.db.db.Db(db_url)[source]¶

Bases: object

If you want to change the db just change lines 21-22 to the new db initialization. Make sure the db implements the methods: save_to_db, all the get_ queries Also - all functions use *args so it’s easy to replace to a db that needs different arguments for those methods

braincomputer.db.mongodb module¶

class braincomputer.db.mongodb.Mongodb(db_url)[source]¶

Bases: object

The DB has 2 tables- for users and for snapshots.

update users table if it’s a new user, and insert a snapshot to snapshots table
